## [7.4.1](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/sootballs_ims/compare/7.4.0...7.4.1) (2024-11-15)


### Bug Fixes

* Add message to message bus on label reprint ([#110](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/sootballs_ims/issues/110)) ([8121b14](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/sootballs_ims/commit/8121b143044d412cf24e5007a6f082bdfc8743b0))

## [5.4.0](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/sootballs_tasks/compare/5.3.0...5.4.0) (2024-12-26)


### Features

* Add time based activation of RobotCapacityLimit ([#56](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/sootballs_tasks/issues/56)) ([7aee473](https://github.com/rapyuta-robotics/sootballs_tasks/commit/7aee473989c9923e86f4c323785d3b961fef5f52))
